INSERT INTO zk_dubbo_service_node ( service_id, interface_name, version, address, last_sync_time, gmt_created, gmt_modified ) VALUES
( #{item.serviceId}, #{item.interfaceName}, #{item.version}, #{item.address}, #{item.lastSyncTime}, #{item.createdAt}, #{item.updatedAt} )
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE interface_name = VALUES(interface_name), version = VALUES(version), last_sync_time = VALUES(last_sync_time), gmt_modified = VALUES(gmt_modified)
